title: Red Bull Wallpapers
summary: Every day new and free HD sports wallpapers for your Android.
description: Red Bull Wallpapers brings the World of Red Bull action sports directly to your Android smartphone, tablet, and Android Wear smart watch. Customize your lock and home screen with breathtaking free sports wallpapers and exciting action sports backgrounds and backdrops in Full HD, or set your watch face to showcase selected epic pictures of the best sports action that change based on the time of day.All animated live wallpapers, HD sports backgrounds, and sports watchfaces are available for free. Give your smartphone or tablet more character with thrilling action sports backgrounds or HD sport wallpapers and backdrops of your favorite athletes and legends such as Daniel Ricciardo (F1), Travis Rice (Snowboarding), Ryan Sheckler (Skate), Mick Fanning (Surf) and many more. Enjoy amazing free HD backgrounds while your device is charging with full Daydream support*.All features:â€¢ 18+ free & animated sports live wallpaperâ€¢ More than 250 free backgrounds, wallpapers, and backdrops of sports action, athletes, and free adventure HD photosâ€¢ Customize athlete and sports live wallpapers to your tasteâ€¢ Favorite backgrounds and HD sports wallpapers you likeâ€¢ Let Red Bull Wallpapers choose a new sports wallpaper everyday with the wallpaper changerâ€¢ Interactive animated sports wallpaper react to user inputâ€¢ Free Daydream support* for animated HD backgrounds and free Red Bull sports wallpapers while charging your phoneâ€¢ Includes Red Bull watch faces that react to the time of day (compatible with devices running Android 5.0+)All the sports backdrops you will need. Red Bull Wallpapers includes:â€¢ Motorsport (Rally, Enduro, FMX, MotoGP, Racing & Car backdrops)â€¢ Formula 1 (F1 backgrounds)â€¢ Motocross (MX wallpaper)â€¢ Skateboarding (Skate wallpaper)â€¢ Surfing (Surf wallpaper)â€¢ Snowboarding (Snow wallpapers)â€¢ Skiing (Ski background)â€¢ BMX (Bike backgrounds)â€¢ Mountainbiking (MTB wallpapers)â€¢ Kitesurfing (Kiteboarding backdrops)â€¢ Parkour (Freerunning backgrounds)â€¢ Trial Biking (Biking wallpapers)â€¢ Adventure wallpapersâ€¢ Action backgroundsâ€¢ And many more amazing free sports backgrounds, wallpapers, and backdropsFeatured Athletes:â€¢ Daniel Ricciardo (F1)â€¢ Julien Dupont (FMX)â€¢ Ryan Sheckler (Skate)â€¢ Ryan Doyle (Parkour)â€¢ Mick Fanning (Surf)â€¢ Sally Fizgibbons (Surf)â€¢ Danny MacAskill (Trial Bike)â€¢ Dawid Godziek (BMX)â€¢ Travis Rice (Snowboarding)any many, many more.You want more? More F1, Snowboarding, Skateboarding, Surfing, Skiing, Kitesurfing, Adventure, MTB or BMX sports wallpapers? We update Red Bull Wallpapers with new sports photo content on a daily basis. Let us know what sports wallpapers you are missing at wallpapers@support.redbull.comAvailable in the following languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Turkish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Indonesian, Filipino, Korean and Chinese (simplified & traditional)Compatibility: Android 4.0+ for static and live wallpapers, Android 5.0+ for Red Bull Watch Faces. Red Bull Wallpapers is optimized for Google Nexus devices with perfect high-resolution Nexus Wallpapers and for use with GO Launcher EX on Samsung Galaxy devices for exceptional Galaxy Wallpapers.*Daydream is only available on devices running Android 4.2 or above
descriptionHTML:
Red Bull Wallpapers brings the World of Red Bull action sports directly to your Android smartphone, tablet, and Android Wear smart watch. Customize your lock and home screen with breathtaking free sports wallpapers and exciting action sports backgrounds and backdrops in Full HD, or set your watch face to showcase selected epic pictures of the best sports action that change based on the time of day.


All animated live wallpapers, HD sports backgrounds, and sports watchfaces are available for free. Give your smartphone or tablet more character with thrilling action sports backgrounds or HD sport wallpapers and backdrops of your favorite athletes and legends such as Daniel Ricciardo (F1), Travis Rice (Snowboarding), Ryan Sheckler (Skate), Mick Fanning (Surf) and many more. Enjoy amazing free HD backgrounds while your device is charging with full Daydream support*.


All features:

• 18+ free & animated sports live wallpaper
• More than 250 free backgrounds, wallpapers, and backdrops of sports action, athletes, and free adventure HD photos
• Customize athlete and sports live wallpapers to your taste
• Favorite backgrounds and HD sports wallpapers you like
• Let Red Bull Wallpapers choose a new sports wallpaper everyday with the wallpaper changer
• Interactive animated sports wallpaper react to user input
• Free Daydream support* for animated HD backgrounds and free Red Bull sports wallpapers while charging your phone
• Includes Red Bull watch faces that react to the time of day (compatible with devices running Android 5.0+)

All the sports backdrops you will need. Red Bull Wallpapers includes:

• Motorsport (Rally, Enduro, FMX, MotoGP, Racing & Car backdrops)
• Formula 1 (F1 backgrounds)
• Motocross (MX wallpaper)
• Skateboarding (Skate wallpaper)
• Surfing (Surf wallpaper)
• Snowboarding (Snow wallpapers)
• Skiing (Ski background)
• BMX (Bike backgrounds)
• Mountainbiking (MTB wallpapers)
• Kitesurfing (Kiteboarding backdrops)
• Parkour (Freerunning backgrounds)
• Trial Biking (Biking wallpapers)
• Adventure wallpapers
• Action backgrounds
• And many more amazing free sports backgrounds, wallpapers, and backdrops

Featured Athletes:

• Daniel Ricciardo (F1)
• Julien Dupont (FMX)
• Ryan Sheckler (Skate)
• Ryan Doyle (Parkour)
• Mick Fanning (Surf)
• Sally Fizgibbons (Surf)
• Danny MacAskill (Trial Bike)
• Dawid Godziek (BMX)
• Travis Rice (Snowboarding)

any many, many more.

You want more?

More F1, Snowboarding, Skateboarding, Surfing, Skiing, Kitesurfing, Adventure, MTB or BMX sports wallpapers? We update Red Bull Wallpapers with new sports photo content on a daily basis. Let us know what sports wallpapers you are missing at wallpapers@support.redbull.com

Available in the following languages:

English, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Turkish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Indonesian, Filipino, Korean and Chinese (simplified & traditional)

Compatibility:

Android 4.0+ for static and live wallpapers, Android 5.0+ for Red Bull Watch Faces. Red Bull Wallpapers is optimized for Google Nexus devices with perfect high-resolution Nexus Wallpapers and for use with GO Launcher EX on Samsung Galaxy devices for exceptional Galaxy Wallpapers.

*Daydream is only available on devices running Android 4.2 or above
comments: Love the wallpapers and use it on both my phone and tablet. The daily auto change of wallpaper doesn't work on either my Moto G4 or Samsung galaxy tab s2. Nor did it on my previous tab and phone. It's my only problem with the app so I figured 4* until it does as it states. Thanks anyway.
Always stops working The app always stops working on my moto 360 2nd gen. It happen every time when ever i try to set it as my watch's face. I am using the latest version of Android on my watch.

The wallpapers are cool but.... They are nice but the wallpapers do not fit in the centre of my display even if I use single screen on my display and kept the the scroll wallpaper option off. Maybe they just don't want to fit in the centre of my screen.ðŸ˜…

Not working in moto360 This app used to support my moto360 smart watch and after the last update it doesn't support it anymore. Please fix the bug. I really like the wallpapers but I want it in my smart watch again.
Keeps crashing on my zenwatch 2 I think it has support for only round watch faces..please resolve this issue
Watch face crash! The watch face keeps crashing on wearables. Every time i pair the watch, i see crash notifications. I couldnt even use the watch without uninstalling this app!
recentChanges: Updated version to fit the new Android N Features
